content:
Certainly! Here are some examples of institutions/organizations that the University of Exeter has partnered with on sustainability initiatives:

1. The Met Office - collaborative research on climate change and adaptation
2. The Eden Project - joint research on sustainable energy and ecosystems
3. Exeter City Futures - partnership to develop sustainable solutions for urban areas
4. National Trust - research partnership on sustainable land management 
5. Devon Wildlife Trust - collaboration on conservation and biodiversity projects 
6. Forest Research - joint research on sustainable forestry solutions 
7. DEFRA - research and policy partnership on sustainable food systems 
8. EU Horizon 2020 projects - collaboration on various sustainability projects, such as green transport and circular economy solutions. 

These are just a few examples of the many sustainability partnerships the University of Exeter has forged over the years!
